content:
Dance is often its own language PERIOD

It can tell stories that audiences can relate to and preserve cultures that may have faded from view PERIOD

The Philadelphia Dance Company also known as Philadanco embraces these aspects of dance in the groups performances PERIOD

This was seen Monday as Philadanco performed a four part show at the Clarence Brown Theatre PERIOD The event was sponsored by the Black Cultural Programming Committee and Multicultural Student Life PERIOD

Philadanco was founded in  by Joan Myers Brown and is a nonprofit organization that works to strengthen the skills of dancers and choreographers and increase appreciation for dance according to its website PERIOD

Its inception was inspired by the need for a school for black dancers who were denied entry to other dance schools PERIOD

They are also known for their creativity welltrained dancers and preservation of AfricanAmerican style dance PERIOD Their mission is to teach youth leadership and development skills to help them succeed in both dance and everyday life PERIOD

The first of the four 20minute dances was  featuring glittering costumes and several solo dances choreographed to upbeat funk music PERIOD

 Stacey Rooks junior in child and family studies said PERIOD 

The second was titled  a dance involving many partner solos as well as group choreography PERIOD

After intermission  was performed PERIOD This third section was made up of different dances incorporating real life situations PERIOD In one instance a woman was depicted dancing for money and another told the story of a broken marriage PERIOD

Darrisha Triplet a student at Austin East High School named  as her favorite piece at the event PERIOD

 Triplet said PERIOD

The last dance was entitled  For this the dancers wore costumes that resembled military jackets and danced mostly in pairs or as a group PERIOD

 said Natasha Wicker freshman in the Arts and Sciences PERIOD 

Rooks a member of the Black Cultural Programming Committee said the Philadelphia Dance Company shows their love for dance through their performances PERIOD

 Rooks said PERIOD 

The Black Cultural Programing Committee is sponsoring more events this semester including  on Nov PERIOD  PERIOD This will feature comedian Gary Owen from  as well as Robert Powell and Gene Harding according to the event program PERIOD

A homecoming package will be sold to UT students for  until Oct PERIOD  including tickets for both the comedy event and Stomp Fest PERIOD

More information on upcoming events hosted by the Black Cultural Programming Committee can be found on its website multicultural.utk.edubcpcindex.php PERIOD Further information on the Philadelphia Dance Company and their program can be found on their website or Facebook page PERIOD
